organization.name: THE AGENCY
organization.fullName: Association of Gaming and Educational Nexus of Cyprus
organization.tagline: Official esports federation initiative in Cyprus

seo.title: THE AGENCY | Association of Gaming and Educational Nexus of Cyprus
seo.description: THE AGENCY is building Cyprus' institutional esports future through governance, education, and competitive development.

hero.title: Institutional Esports Leadership for Cyprus
hero.subtitle: Building a nationally recognized federation that develops talent, promotes fair play, and advances educational impact through gaming.

whoWeAre.title: WHO WE ARE
whoWeAre.text: THE AGENCY unites players, organizers, educators, and industry professionals into one structured federation initiative. We operate with institutional discipline to support Cyprus esports through governance standards, event frameworks, and community development.

items.title: Attack
items.description: Establish a reliable competitive ecosystem with official leagues, transparent rules, and long-term player pathways.

items.title: Defend
items.description: Represent Cyprus in regional and international esports circles while enforcing integrity, professionalism, and inclusion.

items.title: Heal
items.description: Educate families, schools, and institutions on balanced gaming culture, digital skills, and responsible growth.

milestones.title: Founded
milestones.description: THE AGENCY launched as a unified initiative for Cyprus esports governance and growth.

milestones.title: National Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded collaborative programs with tournament operators, creators, and educational partners.

milestones.title: Federation Status Track
milestones.description: Progressed institutional frameworks toward official federation-grade representation.

members.name: Alex Andreou
members.description: Leads organizational strategy, partnership development, and operational execution for THE AGENCY.

members.name: Alex Georgiou
members.description: Builds community operations, event communications, and player-facing engagement initiatives.

members.name: JOHN THEOPHANOUS
members.description: Designs institutional media identity, campaign visuals, and federation storytelling systems.

members.name: NIK POPOV
members.description: Develops event production frameworks, platform reliability, and tournament technical standards.

members.name: ZAC SPYROU
members.description: Leads public communication, sponsor narratives, and strategic media representation.
